tool_description: Calculates the materials, time, space, and preparation requirements needed to execute specified learning activities.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to calculate requirements for

budget_limit.description: Budget limit in USD for materials (0-1000)

available_time_minutes.description: Available time for preparation in minutes (5-480)

space_type.description: Available space: small_indoor, large_indoor, outdoor, or flexible

error_messages: Empty activity list: At least one activity ID must be provided.
Invalid budget: budget_limit must be between 0 and 1000 USD.
Invalid time: available_time_minutes must be between 5 and 480 minutes.
Invalid space type: Must be one of [small_indoor, large_indoor, outdoor, flexible].
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
usage: Provide activity IDs to calculate resource requirements. Optionally specify budget limits, available preparation time, and space constraints for feasibility analysis.

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all materials in USD

total_prep_time.description: Total preparation time needed in minutes

materials_list.description: Complete list of materials needed for all activities

feasibility_assessment.description: Overall assessment of feasibility given constraints
